title: 1FZ-FE Engine Specifications
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Engine Specifications (1FZ-FE)
Type: inline-6
Displacement: 4.5L (4477cc)
Fuel system: EFI (multiport)
Horsepower: 212 hp
Torque: 275 lb-ft
Compression ratio: 9.0:1
Firing order: 1-5-3-6-2-4
Bore: 100 mm, Stroke: 95 mm

title: Engine Oil Specs
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Engine Oil Specifications
Capacity With Filter Qt: 6.8
Capacity Without Filter Qt: 6.1
Capacity With Filter L: 6.4
Recommended Viscosity: 5W-30, 10W-30
Filter Part Number: 90915-YZZB6
Drain Plug Torque Ft Lbs: 27

title: Engine Coolant Specs
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Engine Coolant Specifications
Capacity Qt: 15.1
Capacity L: 14.3
Type: Toyota Red (SLLC) or equivalent
Thermostat Opens F: 180

content:

Interval Km: 8000

title: HF2AV Transfer Case
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Transfer Case (HF2AV)
Code: HF2AV
Type: full-time 4WD with center differential
Has Center Diff: True
Has Center Locker: True
Ratios:
  High: 1.0
  Low: 2.488
Fluid Capacity Qt: 1.5
Fluid Type: GL-5 80W-90
Shift Pattern: H-2H-4H-N-4L
Notes: Full-time 4WD, center diff lock for slippery conditions

title: Front Axle Specifications
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Front Axle
Type: solid axle with birfield CV joints
Housing: high-pinion reverse-rotation
Diff Capacity Qt: 2.6
Diff Type: open standard, ARB locker optional
Fluid Type: GL-5 80W-90
Gear Ratio Options: 4.10, 4.30, 4.56, 5.29
Stock Ratio: 4.10
Birfield Notes: Weak point for large tires, consider chromoly upgrade
Knuckle Stud Torque Ft Lbs: 80

content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Rear Axle

Diff Capacity Qt: 3.2
Diff Type: open, limited-slip (e-locker available 96-97)
Fluid Type: GL-5 80W-90
Axle Nut Torque Ft Lbs: 90

title: Tire Specifications & Alternatives
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Tire Specifications
OEM Size: 275/70R16
Rotation Interval: 7500 miles
Front Pressure: 29 psi
Rear Pressure: 29 psi
Spare Location: under rear cargo area

Alternative Tire Sizes:
  285/75R16: Fits stock, minor rubbing possible
  315/75R16: Requires 2.5"+ lift, possible trimming
  33x10.50R15: Popular upgrade
  35x12.50R15: Requires 3"+ lift, regearing recommended

title: Common Issue: Head Gasket
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Common Issue: Head gasket failure, especially vehicles with cooling system neglect
Severity: high
Affected Years: 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997
Typical Cost: $2,000 - $4,000
Symptoms:
  - Overheating
  - Coolant loss with no visible leak
  - White exhaust smoke
  - Milky oil
  - Bubbles in coolant reservoir
Causes:
  - Inadequate coolant maintenance
  - Overheating events
  - Thermal cycling stress
Prevention:
  - Regular coolant flushes
  - OEM thermostat
  - Address overheating immediately

title: Common Issue: Birfield Wear
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Common Issue: CV joint (birfield) wear, especially with larger tires
Severity: medium
Affected Years: 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997
Typical Cost: $500 - $1,500
Symptoms:
  - Clicking when turning
  - Torn CV boot
  - Grease on inside of wheel
Causes:
  - High mileage
  - Aggressive off-road use
  - Oversized tires
  - Boot damage
Prevention:
  - Regular boot inspection
  - Repack joints at 100k

title: Common Issue: Charcoal Canister
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Common Issue: Evaporative emissions charcoal canister saturation
Severity: low
Affected Years: 1993, 1994, 1995
Typical Cost: $200 - $400
Symptoms:
  - Fuel smell
  - Check engine light
  - Hard starting when hot
Causes:
  - Age
  - Overfilling fuel tank
Fix: Replace charcoal canister

title: Common Issue: Frame Rust
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Common Issue: Frame rust in salt belt regions
Severity: critical
Affected Years: 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997
Symptoms:
  - Visible rust on frame
  - Rust flaking
  - Structural compromise
Prevention:
  - Annual undercoating
  - Wash undercarriage after salt exposure
Fix: Frame repair or replacement

title: Common Issue: Ps Pump Whine
content:
Toyota Land Cruiser FZJ80 Common Issue: Power steering pump whine/leak
Severity: medium
Affected Years: 1993, 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997
Typical Cost: $300 - $600
Symptoms:
  - Whining noise when turning
  - Fluid leak at pump
